description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Eggplant Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Smoky Eggplant Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, very thinly sliced
2 large ripe roma tomatoes, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Lay the eggplant on tray and slash with small diagonal cuts. Sprinkle the cumin and paprika over the eggplant and drizzle with half the olive oil. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft and golden. Remove from oven and drizzle with lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.
Spread yoghurt onto plates. Top with tomato. Place eggplant onto salad and drizzle with remaining oil. Sprinkle with parsley leaves, pomegranate arils and onion, to serve.
